attributes.action: Ban all public transport due to CORONAVIRUS as fear spreads in uk.
attributes.additional_details: If we do not close them, more will be infected. This will lead to a catastrophy and numbers will increase.
attributes.background: I want to close public transport because of the coronavirus spreading. If we do not close them, more will be infected. This will lead to a catastrophy and numbers will increase.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300900.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
